snippet: Moody’s Investors Service said it was considering a downgrade in light of what it called a “softening” of both Met ticket sales and contributions from donors.
abstract: Moody's Investors Service puts Metropolitan Opera under review for possible downgrade of its credit rating, underscoring gravity of company's financial challenges.
lead_paragraph: Moody’s Investors Service said it was considering a downgrade in light of what it called a “softening” of both Met ticket sales and contributions from donors.

headline.main: Metropolitan Opera’s Credit Rating Is Under Review for Possible Downgrade
headline.print_headline: Met Opera’s Credit Rating Faces Possible Downgrade

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject
